title: Phone Breaks
flavorText: Your phone screen just cracked. It still works, but barely.

options.label: Buy a screen protector
options.description: Cheap fix, but it's not great.

options.label: Use it cracked
options.description: Save your money, deal with the annoyance.

options.label: Ask family for help
options.description: They might cover it, but you owe them.

title: New Teacher Notices You
flavorText: Your science teacher pulls you aside and says you have potential.

options.label: Join the after-school program
options.description: Extra work, but a great connection.

options.label: Say thanks, keep your schedule
options.description: Nice to hear, but you're busy.

title: Friend Drama
flavorText: Your two closest friends are fighting and both want you to pick a side.

options.label: Try to mediate
options.description: Play peacemaker. It's stressful but might work.

options.label: Stay out of it
options.description: Not your problem. But they might be upset.

options.label: Pick a side
options.description: You keep one friend happy, lose the other.

title: Bike Trouble
flavorText: Your bike tire is flat and you need to get to school.

options.label: Buy a new tube
options.description: Quick fix, costs a bit.

options.label: Walk this week
options.description: It works, but eats into your time.

options.label: Ask a friend's parent for rides
options.description: They'll help, but you owe them.

title: Club Invitation
flavorText: The robotics club is looking for new members. The advisor says you'd be great.

options.label: Join the club
options.description: New skills and friends, but it'll take time.

options.label: Pass for now
options.description: Maybe next semester. Keep your time free.

title: Peer Pressure
flavorText: Some kids at school want you to skip class and hang out at the mall.

options.label: Go along
options.description: It's fun in the moment. Consequences later.

options.label: Say no
options.description: You stay. They call you boring.

options.label: Suggest something else
options.description: Redirect the group. Takes social skill.

title: Scholarship Opportunity
flavorText: Your counselor tells you about a local scholarship. Deadline is tight.

options.label: Apply immediately
options.description: Drop everything and write the essay. Worth the stress if you get it.

options.label: Skip it
options.description: Too much pressure right now.

title: Family Crisis
flavorText: A family member is in the hospital. Everyone's stressed.

options.label: Be there for family
options.description: Miss some school, but your family needs you.

options.label: Keep going to school
options.description: You push through. Others handle it.

title: Part-Time Job Offer
flavorText: The local grocery store is hiring and the manager liked your application.

options.label: Take the job
options.description: Money coming in, but less free time.

options.label: Decline
options.description: Keep your schedule open. Focus on school.

title: Relationship Drama
flavorText: Your first serious relationship is getting complicated. Your friends have opinions.

options.label: Invest in the relationship
options.description: Spend time and energy on making it work.

options.label: Pull back
options.description: Focus on yourself. It might not last.

options.label: Talk to a trusted adult
options.description: Get perspective. Healthy move.

title: Bullying Incident
flavorText: Someone's been targeting you online. Screenshots are spreading.

options.label: Report it
options.description: Tell administration. It might help, or it might not.

options.label: Ignore it
options.description: Hope it blows over. Keep your head down.

options.label: Confront them
options.description: Stand up for yourself. Risky but empowering.

title: Gap Year Temptation
flavorText: A friend is taking a gap year to travel. They want you to come along.

options.label: Go for it
options.description: Life experience! But you'll fall behind on plans.

options.label: Stay focused
options.description: Stick to your plan. There's time for travel later.

title: Mentor Connection
flavorText: A professional in your area of interest offers to mentor you.

options.label: Accept the mentorship
options.description: Weekly meetings. Huge opportunity.

options.label: Politely decline
options.description: Your schedule is too packed right now.

title: Unexpected Expense
flavorText: Your laptop died and you need it for school/work.

options.label: Buy a new one
options.description: Essential, but expensive.

options.label: Find a used one
options.description: Cheaper, but unreliable.

options.label: Use the library
options.description: Free, but incredibly inconvenient.

title: Roommate Conflict
flavorText: Your roommate isn't paying their share of bills. Tension is rising.

options.label: Have an honest conversation
options.description: Awkward but necessary.

options.label: Cover for them this month
options.description: Keep the peace, lose the money.

options.label: Start looking for a new place
options.description: Protect yourself, but it's disruptive.

title: Car Trouble
flavorText: Your car won't start. You need it to get to work.

options.label: Get it repaired
options.description: Expensive but necessary.

options.label: Take the bus
options.description: Cheaper, but adds time to your commute.

options.label: Ask for rides
options.description: Your support network might help.

title: Medical Bill
flavorText: You went to urgent care for a bad cough. The bill just arrived.

options.label: Pay it off
options.description: Hurts now, but it's done.

options.label: Set up a payment plan
options.description: Manageable, but the stress lingers.

options.label: Ignore it for now
options.description: Bad idea. But you're broke.

title: Promotion Offer
flavorText: Your manager says there's an opening for a team lead position.

options.label: Go for it
options.description: More money, more responsibility, more stress.

options.label: Pass for now
options.description: Stay in your comfort zone. For now.

title: Lease Renewal
flavorText: Your landlord is raising rent by 15%. The lease renewal deadline is next week.

options.label: Negotiate
options.description: Try to get a better deal. Takes courage.

options.label: Accept the increase
options.description: Less hassle, more cost.

options.label: Move somewhere cheaper
options.description: Save money, but moving is exhausting.

title: Identity Theft
flavorText: Someone opened a credit card in your name. You got a letter from collections.

options.label: File a police report
options.description: Start the process. It's long and stressful.

options.label: Call the credit bureau
options.description: Dispute it. Might take months.

title: Surprise Inheritance
flavorText: A distant relative left you some money. Not a fortune, but it helps.

options.label: Save it
options.description: Put it in your emergency fund. Smart move.

options.label: Pay off debt
options.description: Clear your bills. Breathe easier.

options.label: Treat yourself
options.description: You deserve something nice for once.

title: Workplace Conflict
flavorText: A coworker is taking credit for your work. Your boss doesn't seem to notice.

options.label: Speak up
options.description: Talk to your boss directly. Risky but fair.

options.label: Document everything
options.description: Build your case quietly. Play the long game.

options.label: Let it go
options.description: Pick your battles. This one isn't worth it.

title: Community Opportunity
flavorText: A local nonprofit needs volunteers for a weekend event. Your friend signed you up.

options.label: Show up and help
options.description: Give back. Meet new people.

options.label: Back out
options.description: You're too busy right now.
